struct ListNode* middle_find(struct ListNode* head) {
    struct ListNode* slow = head;
    struct ListNode* fast = head->next;

    while (fast != NULL && fast->next != NULL) {
        slow = slow->next;
        fast = fast->next->next;
    }
    return slow;
}

struct ListNode* reverse(struct ListNode* right_head) {
    struct ListNode* new_head = NULL;
    while (right_head != NULL) {
        struct ListNode* next = right_head->next;
        right_head->next = new_head;
        new_head = right_head;
        right_head = next;
    }
    return new_head;
}

bool isPalindrome(struct ListNode* head) {
    if (head == NULL) {
        return NULL;
    }

    struct ListNode* middle = middle_find(head);
    struct ListNode* right = reverse(middle->next);
    struct ListNode* right_copy = right;
    struct ListNode* tmp = head;

    while (tmp != NULL && right_copy != NULL) {
        if (tmp->val != right_copy->val) {
            return false;
        }
        tmp = tmp->next;
        right_copy = right_copy->next;
    }

    middle->next = reverse(right);
    return true;
}

int** threeSum(int* nums, int numsSize, int* returnSize, int** returnColumnSizes) {

    *returnSize = 0;

    qsort(nums, numsSize, sizeof(int), cmp);

    int** result = (int**)malloc(numsSize * numsSize * sizeof(int*));

    for (int i = 0; i < numsSize - 2; i++) {

        }

        int left = i + 1;
        int right = numsSize - 1;

                result[*returnSize] = (int*)malloc(3 * sizeof(int));

                while (left < right && nums[left] == nums[left + 1]) left++;

}

int lengthOfLongestSubstring(char* s) {
    int n = strlen(s);
    if (n == 0) return 0;
    
    int maxLength = 0;
    int start = 0;
    int charIndex[128];  // ASCII å­—ç¬¦æ€»æ•°ä¸º128
    
    // åˆå§‹åŒ–charIndexæ•°ç»„ï¼Œ-1è¡¨ç¤ºæœªå‡ºç°è¿‡
    for (int i = 0; i < 128; i++) {
        charIndex[i] = -1;
    }
    
    for (int end = 0; end < n; end++) {
        char currentChar = s[end];
        // å¦‚æœå½“å‰å­—ç¬¦ä¹‹å‰å·²ç»åœ¨çª—å£ä¸­å‡ºç°è¿‡ï¼Œç§»åŠ¨startæŒ‡é’ˆ
        if (charIndex[currentChar] >= start) {
            start = charIndex[currentChar] + 1;
        }
        
        // æ›´æ–°å­—ç¬¦çš„æœ€æ–°å‡ºç°ä½ç½®
        charIndex[currentChar] = end;
        
        // æ›´æ–°æœ€å¤§é•¿åº¦
        int currentLength = end - start + 1;
        if (currentLength > maxLength) {
            maxLength = currentLength;
        }
    }
    
    return maxLength;
}
